name.description: Name of SmartSearchUI instances as seen in DC/OS.

cpus.description: Number of logical cores to allocate to each service instance.

mem.description: Memory in Mb to allocate to each service instance.

disk.description: Number of disks to allocate to each service instance.

artifact_URI.description: If your service requires additional files and/or archives of files, enter their URIs to download and, if necessary, extract these resources.

networking.description: Configure the networking for your service.

health_checks.description: Health checks may be specified per application to be run against the application's instances.

path.description: Enter a path that is reachable in your service and where you expect a response code between 200 and 399.
